title: New: Fitness Club Fiasco – Hades
body: Ontario’s **Fitness Club Fiasco** sound like they’re ready to play to colossal festival crowds, and this is only their second track. Hades is ambitious, gloriously over-the-top at points, and resoundingly anthemic. Check it out below, and grab a free download over at [Bandcamp](http://fitnessclubfiasco.bandcamp.com/).
